snippet: An unidentified man has robbed or tried to rob as many as 16 people on the Lower East Side in the last two months, the police said.
abstract: New York City police are looking for a man they suspect has robbed or tried to rob as many as 16 people on the Lower East Side of Manhattan in the last two months by knife or gunpoint.
lead_paragraph: An unidentified man has robbed or tried to rob as many as 16 people on the Lower East Side in the last two months, the police said.

headline.seo: Police Looking for Man in Series of Manhattan Robberies
headline.main: Police Are Seeking Man in Series of Robberies
headline.print_headline: Police Are Seeking Man in Series of Robberies
